plot: A young fisherman decides to take action and be true to his principles, despite the abuse and humiliation he receives from his father and brothers.
title: La pesca
plot_es: A young fisherman decides to take action and be true to his principles, despite the abuse and humiliation he receives from his father and brothers.
plot_en: A young fisherman decides to take action and be true to his principles, despite the abuse and humiliation he receives from his father and brothers.
